Welcome to the main page of my portfolio!

My projects are listed across this page, which are intended for training Front-end technologies and developing some interesting / useful functionality.

I hope that these projects clearly reflect the show-cases of my programming skills in the Front-end area.

List with projects along with the short notes about their peculiarities:

  • Image processing with Vanilla JS

    Project has been implemented using only pure stack HTML / CSS / JS for composing the static webpage. It is the show-case of pure JS functions for image processing, data reading, saving and visualizing.

  • Serverless Quiz

    Project has been implemented using again only pure Front-end stack. It is the show-case of emulating asynchronous requests to the back-end code and interact with users by processing their input.

  • More will be added, including React and other CCS libraries based.

Cards-preview of the projects:
Image processing using Vanilla JS

Show-case of the available built-in functions in the pure (vanilla) JS for serverless image processing

Serverless Quiz about the U.S. states

Show-case of asynchronous programming using vanilla JS and show-case of styling with pure CSS for various screen sizes (devices)
